description_for_human: Email for AI agents. Create inboxes, receive mail, extract OTPs via REST API.
description_for_model: ShellMail provides email addresses for AI agents. Use it to: 1) Create email addresses at @shellmail.ai, 2) Receive and read emails via API, 3) Automatically extract OTP/verification codes, 4) Get webhook notifications on new mail. Authentication uses Bearer tokens. The OTP endpoint supports long-polling to wait for codes to arrive.
